Content: *p71887a01632*16  18 lacticacid is formed in muscles and in sour milk.ch3ccohohholacticacid may be obtained from ethanal in the laboratory by the twostep synthesisshown.ch3ccohohhoch3cohch3ccnohhstep 1hcn / cnstep 2hcl(aq)*(a) explain why lacticacid formed in muscles is optically active while lacticacid obtained using the laboratory synthesis is not. you should define any terms you use.(6)
